title: iPhone 13 Pro vs Pixel 6 Pro: 2000 Photos Later | Full Frame Ep. 5
description: When the iPhone 13 Pro launched earlier this fall, we said it had the best camera in a smartphone. But a few weeks later, Googles Pixel 6 Pro, with its 50-megapixel sensor that is hard-coded to produce 12.5-megapixel images, was finally released, proving a worthy competitor for the iPhone 13 Pros 12-megapixel camera.
